backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping Valentine app requirements to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of core frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining color variables and theming with light/dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine interaction UI with an evasive No button and a Yes success screen showing a meme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identity, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining a romantic pink/white theme, dark mode, animations, and touch tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentityProvider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic Valentine web page with Yes/No behavior, meme reveal, features, and requirements.
